title: Blended Learning Course for Strengthening Information Literacy Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and college-level reading/writing proficiency
context.additional_context: Primarily composed of general citizens as learners, with a focus on applying information evaluation and production competencies to solve real-life problems

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze academic and non-academic information sources based on evaluation criteria
Learners can systematically collect and reorganize credible information using digital tools
Learners can apply information literacy competencies to real-world problem-solving through project-based assessments and share outcomes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
